articles.author: Stefan Bondy
articles.title: Knicks' toughness has lifted them beyond expectations - New York Post
articles.description: The most impressive statistic about these Knicks, often overlooked, is that not a single member of the rotation was a lottery pick.
articles.content:
Weve heard forever and admittedly regurgitated by myself that the path to NBA success is through superstars.
